comments:
Build: I-20030717
During the plug-in import operation, in the case of overwriting plug-ins, we 
first delete the old plug-in project and then create a new one.
When deleting the org.eclipse.ui.externaltools, I got the following resource 
exception.  I'm not sure what it means or when/why it would occur.

Error Jul 17, 2003 13:09:13.890 Could not delete metadata 
for: /org.eclipse.ui.externaltools.
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Could not delete 
metadata for: /org.eclipse.ui.externaltools.
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.LocalMetaArea.delete
(LocalMetaArea.java:72)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceTree.deletedProject
(ResourceTree.java:360)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceTree.standardDeleteProject
(ResourceTree.java:720)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.delete(Resource.java:638)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.delete(Project.java:288)
at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.PluginImportOperation.createProject
(PluginImportOperation.java:141)
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.PluginImportOperation.run
(PluginImportOperation.java:109)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1595)
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.PluginImportWizard$2.run
(PluginImportWizard.java:131)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:101)

Usually these errors are due to file sharing problems. Did you have any other 
resources open on those files? (e.g. a DOS console?)
No dos cosole.  no windows explorer.
We've never been able to reproduce
